Test Name: HIV-1 Genotypic Drug Resistance (Reverse Transcriptase, Protease, Integrase), Plasma
Purpose: To generate reliable and accurate HIV-1 genotypic drug-resistance results for reverse transcriptase, protease, and integrase inhibitors from plasma samples.
Equipment: Centrifuge; PCR thermocycler; Electrophoresis system; Sequencing instrument; Refrigerators/Freezers (−20 °C or lower); Pipettes and tips; Biosafety cabinet
